tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE software_updates (
	update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	software_name VARCHAR(255),
	version VARCHAR(50),
	patch_date DATE,
	status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    software_name VARCHAR(255),
    version VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    patch_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
    patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT,
    patch_date DATE,
    patch_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES software_updates(update_id)
);

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
    update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    software_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    vulnerabilities_found BOOLEAN,
    update_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
    patch_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patch_version TEXT NOT NULL,
    software_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    deployment_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    deployed_successfully BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_audit (
    audit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    software_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    vulnerabilities_found BOOLEAN,
    audit_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  software_name VARCHAR(255),
  version_number VARCHAR(20),
  update_date DATE,
  update_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
  patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patch_name VARCHAR(255),
  patch_date DATE,
  patch_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE update_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  update_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  update_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (update_id) REFERENCES software_updates(update_id)
)

CREATE TABLE patch_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patch_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patch_id) REFERENCES patch_management(patch_id)
)

CREATE TABLE software_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  software_name VARCHAR(50),
  version VARCHAR(20),
  update_date DATE,
  update_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
  patch_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  software_name VARCHAR(50),
  patch_version VARCHAR(20),
  patch_date DATE,
  patch_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE user_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  activity_description TEXT
);
